api_list.name: List of all the English verbs
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the list of all the English verbs.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simplecyto.p.rapidapi.com/english/all-verb"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simplecyto.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Conjugation of verbs in english
api_list.description: This should return the conjugation of the verb according to what you enter
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simplecyto.p.rapidapi.com/english/verb/{infinitive}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simplecyto.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
